definitions.name: switch_agent
definitions.description: Switch to another lightweight test agent. Use this to hand off between agents to test seamless prompt/function updates during a live call.

target_agent.description: The agent to switch to. Valid values: 'base_greeter', 'router_agent', 'joke_agent', 'smalltalk_agent', 'math_agent', 'support_agent', 'echo_agent', 'summarizer_agent'.

definitions.name: end_call
definitions.description: Politely end the call when the user is done.

definitions.name: escalate_to_human
definitions.description: Escalate to a human agent (for testing transfer/CSR flows).
